name: Hide the monster
description:
'Hide the monster' is a plataform game in which we have to protect our main character called 'Geku'; a kindfull monster who is being threatened by the evil human race.

This is our first game, made with Unity. We are a small group, four students from Spain: Fabián Carballo, Carlos Castro, Guillermo Saelices and Manuel Moya.

The game is in Alpha phase and the development lasted about 6 weeks.
